name: VR Fly Fast
description:
*** Featured by Apple 309 times on Adventure and Action Collection List type by different countries. ***

Here comes an excited VR shooting game that you will enjoy - VR Fly Fast.

In a galaxy far, far away, you are the last pilot who fight against the dark empire. Use your force, shoot all enemies.

Unlike other VR game that auto-shoot or stop-to-shoot, VR Fly Fast uses bluetooth gamepad. Play like arcade game or playstation joystick.


Features:
1. Choose first person view mode or third person view mode during game.
2. Easy control by bluetooth gamepad.

Requirements:
You must have iPhone 5 or above, Google cardboard compatible headset, AND bluetooth joystick (icade or ios compatible). Here is a video for connecting bluetooth joystick with iPhone and start the game https://youtu.be/AcNfwxDNOwA
